CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 24, reads: "Nine Negroes Among 22 Steeler Hopefuls - Here on the campus of Slippery Rock State Teachers College, Tuesday morning, the eager but cold eyes of Coach Buddy Parker were weighing the muscular symphony of 22 individual 1961 Pittsburgh Steelers' rookies, nine of whom were young men of color..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Pittsburgh Steelers football players, from left: no. 43 Overton Curtis, no. 63 James Palmer, no. 85 Harold Fisher, no. 36 Wilbert Scott, no. 73 George Balthazar, no. 78 Bert Brown, no. 86 Len Burnett, no. 32 Willie Simpson, and no. 26 Brady Keys, at Slippery Rock State Teachers College
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Steelers (Football team).Men--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Football players--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Football--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Slippery Rock State Teachers College.
